definitions.body: :Is 66:2, Is 66:6 (under infl. of [[יוֹם]] in freq. ´[[יוֹם הַשּׁ]]:, Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 47) sabbath ( = [[ת]] + [[שׁבת]]; NH [[שַׁבָּת]], Aram. [[שַׁבְּתָא]], 4abto0; perh. As šabattum (‖ um nuḫ libbi, day of rest of heart (i.e. propitiation) [of deity]: only in lex. Tablets); cf. Lotz:Quaest. de hist. Sabbati, 1883 Jen:ZA iv (1889), 274 ff. (doubts connexion of As. word with Heb. Sabbath) Id:S. S. Times, Jan. 16, 1892, 35 f. Muss-Arn:JBL xi (1892), 93 Schwally:Idiot. 127; v. (more recently) Jastr:Am. J. Theol. ii (1898), 332 ff. Toy:TBL xviii (1899), 190 ff. Dr:Hast. DB SABBATH (1902) Zim:KAT 3. 592 ff.; ZMG 1904, 199 ff. [15th day of month so called]:458 ff.);—abs. ´[[שׁ]]: Ex 16:25 + 64 t.; cstr. [[שַׁבַּת]] v:Ex 16:23 + 10 t.; sf. [[שַׁבַּתּוֹ]] Nu 28:10 + 3 t. sf.; pl. [[שַׁבָּתוֹת]] Le 23:15 + 7 t.; cstr. [[שַׁבְּתתׁ]] v:Le 23:38, Le 25:3, Le 25:8; sf. [[שַׁבְּתוֹתַי]] Is 56:4 +, etc.;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: primitive [[ליהוה]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ex 16:25 (J), Ex 20:10 = De 5:14 (ten words) Le 23:3 (P); ´[[הַשּׁ]]: Ec 16:29 (J); [[בַּיוֹם]] ´[[הַשְּׁבִיעִי שׁ]]: Ex 16:26 (J); on seventh day [[יוֹם הַשַּׁבָּת]] Ex 20:8, Ex 20:11= De 5:12, De 5:15 (ten words), so throughout; Ex 31:15 + 3 t. P, Je 17:21, Ez Eze 46:4, Ne 10:32 + 9 t., + (‖ new moon) Is 1:13, Ez Eze 46:1, 2Ki 4:23, Am 8:5, cf. Is 66:23, Is 66:23, also [[חג]] and [[מועד]] Ho 2:13; time of change of watch in temple 2Ki 11:5, 2Ki 11:7, 2Ki 11:9, 2Ki 11:9 = 2Ch 23:4, 2Ch 23:8, 2Ch 23:8; [[מיסך]] ´[[הַשּׁ]]: (in temple) 2Ki 16:18; orig. observed simply by abstinence from labour Ex 20:9, Ex 20:10 = De 5:12-14, Ex 23:12 (E), Ex 34:21 (J; Br:Hex. 181–195).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: Deut. reason for day is deliverance fr. Egypt De 5:15, hence its consecration, [[לְקַדְּשׁוֹ]] v:De 5:12 = Ex 20:8; ´[[קדּשׁ יום השׁ]]: Je 17:22, Je 17:24, Je 17:27 (esp. no load carried), Ez Eze 20:20, Eze 44:24.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: P gives as basis God’s resting Ex 20:11, Ex 31:17; ´[[שׁבתות י]]: Le 23:38; [[קדשׁ]] ´[[שׁ]]: [[ליהוה]] Ex 16:23, cf. Ne 9:14, [[שׁבתון]] ´[[שׁ]]: Ex 31:15, Ex 35:2, Le 23:3; ´[[עשׂה השׁ]]: Ex 31:16, [[בְּשַׁבַּתּוֹ]] ´[[עׂלַת שׁ]]: Nu 28:10, cf. Is 66:23; ´[[בְּיוֹם הַשּׁ]] :´[[בְּיוֹם הַשּׁ]]: Le 24:8 on every sabbath, abbr. [[שַׁבַּת שַׁבָּת]] 1Ch 9:32; [[לַשַּׁבָּתוֹת]] ‖[[מועדים ê חֳדָשִׁים ]] 1Ch 23:31 + 3 t. Chr, Ne 10:34 ([[ל]] om. by error); work punished by stoning Nu 15:32, Nu 15:36; trade prohib. Ne 10:32, Ne 13:15-21.
day of atonement is a [[שַׁבַּת שַׁבָּתוֹן]] Le 16:31, Le 23:32 (P), cf. [[שָׁבַת שַׁבָּת]] v:Le 23:32 (P).
sabbath year, [[שַׁבַּת שַׁבָּתוֹן]] Le 25:4 (H); [[שַׁבָּת ליהוה]] v:Le 25:2, v:Le 25:4 (H), ([[הארץ]])[[שַׁבְּתוֹתֶיהָ רחה ]] Le 26:34, Le 26:34, Le 26:43 (H), 2Ch 36:21.

= week(?): [[שֶׁבַע שַׁבָּתוֹת]] Le 23:15 (H), seven sabbaths or weeks; [[שָּׁנִים]]([[ה]])[[שֶׁבַע שַׁבְּתתׁ ]] Le 25:8, Le 25:8 (H) seven sabbaths or weeks (of years), uncertain (v. Mk 16:2, Mk 16:9, Lu 18:12, Mt 28:1, cf. JAram. usage); poss. [[שַׁבָּת]] Is 66:23 = week (Du).
[[שַׁבַּת הָאָ֫רֶץ]] Le 25:6 (H) = produce in sabbath year (growing of itself).
